name: Pixels And Plunder
description:
ARGH!

Set sail for the tiniest adventure on the pixelated sea!  Ransack forts, sink enemy ships, and find buried treasure to get the highest score.

Use the WASD keys to move.  Press/Hold in the same direction to go faster.

Hold down the Arrow Keys to aim and press the SPACE BAR to fire the cannons!

Collect Treasure by completely stopping the ship and pressing the SPACE BAR while not aiming.

Music adapted from The Young Buccaneer by Derek Fiechter
